data.text: @Denislim @DrAmarMOH @wchuin Briefly based on this they would probably want to test higher dose for higher efficacy. But the risk could be higher too @drmusanordin @DGHisham @Khairykj
@DrAmarMOH @KKMPutrajaya @Khairykj , please delay school re-open to 1st April. This will allow the case to come down further and SPM students to complete their exam

@wchuin @ngchowsoon @DrAmarMOH @Khairykj @KKMPutrajaya @DGHisham @JKJAVMY Very sorry to hear what happened. Hoping you and your family have a quick recovery. Very shameful rollout of Covid vaccinations. Mega PPV become mega infection clusters! Shameful @Khairykj @DGHisham @KKMPutrajaya !!

@DrAmarMOH Test positivity rate not up to date on website, but latest Feb 28 info 👇

https://t.co/eNuu0lWOzS
@DrAmarMOH The school holiday helps, education clusters@going down.

@DrAmarMOH @wchuin what's your view of this data?

https://t.co/tX8iyleBjh

@DrAmarMOH I figure it’s like you said about the Delta wave, Doctor … actual cases are probably 2-4 times higher than reported. What more the responsibility now is up to the individual to self-test and self-report. Sigh. 🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️

@ngchowsoon @DrAmarMOH Alas, it is too late.Brought my child for 1st dose at #PPVAxiata on 20/2 by appointment.Terrible overcrowding,SOPs not enforced, disaster in the making.Fever on 24/2, PCR +ve.Truly dejected.
@Khairykj @KKMPutrajaya @DGHisham @JKJAVMY Do better.

@wchuin @DrAmarMOH Vaccine is no guarantee of immunity, just minimize risk of serious illness from covid. That's why SOPs are important: Masking, physical distancing, personal hygiene, avoiding crowds. Stay safe.
